sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Form, Table, Card, Row, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Pagination } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; import '../index.css' class BondPricingTwo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bonds: [], exportBonds: [], label: 'Attach .csv', totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0, totalDate: null, month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), hideTable: true, showCards: { visibility: 'hidden' }, exportData: [], export: "Value as of, Serial #, Series, Denomination, Issue Date, Next Accrual, Final Maturity, Issue Price, Interest, Value", exportResults: [], pages: [], perPage: 2, currentPage: 0, currentRows: 5 }; this.setFilename = this.setFilename.bind(this) this.formatDate = this.formatDate.bind(this) this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) this.onUpdateClick = this.onUpdateClick.bind(this) this.setPrevPage = this.setPrevPage.bind(this) this.setCurrentPage = this.setCurrentPage.bind(this) this.setNextPage = this.setNextPage.bind(this) this.exportOnClick = this.exportOnClick.bind(this) this.handleClickX = this.handleClickX.bind(this) } setPages(bonds) { let pages = [] let pageCount = bonds.length / this.state.perPage let i = 0 while (i < pageCount) { pages.push(i) i++ } this.setState({ pages: pages }) } exportOnClick() { const bonds = this.state.bonds let bondExports = [] bondExports.push(['Lookup Date', 'Serial Number', 'Series', 'Bond Amount', 'Issue Date', 'Next Accrual', 'Final Maturity', 'Issue Price', 'Interest', 'Bond Value']) for (let i = 0; i < bonds.length; i++) { let bondExport = [ bonds[i]['vDate'], bonds[i]['serialNumber'], bonds[i]['series'], '$' + bonds[i]['denomination'], bonds[i]['iDate'], bonds[i]['aDate'], bonds[i]['mDate'], '$' + parseFloat(bonds[i]['iPrice']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(bonds[i]['interest']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(bonds[i]['value']).toFixed(2) ] bondExports.push(bondExport); } bondExports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + this.state.totalDenomination, "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ exportResults: bondExports }) } setCurrentPage(i) { this.setState({ currentPage: i }) } setPrevPage() { this.setState({ currentPage: this.state.currentPage - 1 }) } setNextPage() { this.setState({ currentPage: this.state.currentPage + 1 }) } formatDate(value_date) { const months = { "01": "Jan.", "02": "Feb.", "03": "March", "04": "April", "05": "May", "06": "June", "07": "July", "08": "Aug.", "09": "Sept", "10": "Oct", "11": "Nov", "12": "Dec" } let month = value_date.split('/')[0] if (month.length === 1) { month = '0' + month } let year = value_date.split('/')[1] let month_string = months[month] + ' 1, ' + year return month_string } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } handleClickX(i) { const newBonds = this.state.bonds this.setState({ totalDenomination: this.state.totalDenomination - newBonds[i]['denomination'], totalPrice: this.state.totalPrice - newBonds[i]['iPrice'], totalInterest: this.state.totalInterest - newBonds[i]['interest'], totalValue: this.state.totalValue - newBonds[i]['value'] }) newBonds.splice(i, 1) this.setState({ bonds: newBonds }) this.setPages(newBonds) } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onUpdateClick() { const bondState = this.state.bonds let bonds = [] for (let i = 0; i < bondState.length; i++) { let bond = { 'vMonth': document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value, 'vYear': document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value, 'series': this.state.bonds[i]['series'], 'denomination': this.state.bonds[i]['denomination'], 'serialNumber': this.state.bonds[i]['serialNumber'], 'iDate': this.state.bonds[i]['iDate'] } bonds.push(bond) } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/update', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) this.setState({ bonds: response[0] }) }) } setFilename(e) { if (e.target.files.length > 0) { this.setState({ label: e.target.files[0].name }) } if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false, showCards: { visibility: 'visible' } }) } var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const bondCsv = reader.result let bonds = [] let bondRow = bondCsv.split('\r') for (let i = 1; i < bondRow.length; i++) { let bond = bondRow[i].split(',') let bondDict = { 'vMonth': document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value, 'vYear': document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value, 'serialNumber': bond[0].substring(1), 'series': bond[1], 'denomination': parseInt(bond[2].replace(',', '')), 'iDate': bond[3] } bonds.push(bondDict) } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/update', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { this.setState({ bonds: response[0] }) this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) this.setPages(response[0]) }) } reader.readAsText(e.target.files[0]); } convertValues(value) { return value.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",") } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> ATTACHMENT
{this.state.bonds.length > 0 ?
0 ? this.state.exportResults : ''}>+ [Export]
: null} VALUED AS OF {this.state.totalDate} TOTAL FACE VALUE ${this.convertValues(this.state.totalDenomination)} TOTAL COST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2))} TOTAL INTEREST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2))} TOTAL VALUE ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2))}
{ this.state.bonds.length > 0 ?
{this.state.bonds .slice(this.state.currentPage * this.state.perPage, (this.state.currentPage + 1) * this.state.perPage) .map((bond, i) => ( ))}
Serial Number Bond Type Bond Amount Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Value
{bond['serialNumber']} {bond['series']} ${this.convertValues(bond['denomination'])} {bond['iDate']} {bond['aDate']} {bond['mDate']} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['iPrice']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['interest']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['value']).toFixed(2))}
{this.state.bonds.length > 0 ? {this.state.pages.map((i) => ( this.setCurrentPage(i)}>{i + 1} ))} : null}
: null}
) } } export default BondPricingTwo;
